p: LC was performed using an Agilent 1100 (Agilent Technologies, Waldbronn, Germany) HPLC system consisted of the following components: a pump in a gradient mode, degasser, an auto sampler with a 100 ÂµL injection loop and DAD detector. MS/MS analysis were carried out on an Applied Biosystems/MDS Sciex (Concord, ON, Canada) API 2000 triple quadrupole mass spectrometer with an electrospray ionization (ESI) interface.
